entry.title: Re LP'ing on a bridge is more likely a rewarded action as there is a real cost associated to locking up capital for an extensive period of time and he...
entry.summary: Re LP'ing on a bridge is more likely a rewarded action as there is a real cost associated to locking up capital for an extensive period of time and hence harder to sybil. So is holding a projects native token or NFT. With that being said, let's look at the projects 👇

entry.title: Re Why? Projects increasingly weed out actions that are easy to game and sybil across many wallets. So for example, sending a bridge transfer across a...
entry.summary: Re Why? Projects increasingly weed out actions that are easy to game and sybil across many wallets. So for example, sending a bridge transfer across a chain via LayerZero is relatively inexpensive and could be not enough to get the airdrop.

entry.title: Re LayerZero is a messaging protocol to communicate across Blockchains. It is used for asset bridging, NFT bridging and many other custom use cases. U...
entry.summary: Re LayerZero is a messaging protocol to communicate across Blockchains. It is used for asset bridging, NFT bridging and many other custom use cases. Using these projects built on top of Layer Zero is the best way to get the airdrop. And the more costly the action the better.
